comment: Knock ya damn socks off. Thanks Alexgossett

Wow, so much flavor and so smooth for 116 proof.  Just one big block cube of ice and i can sip on this one for a long time.  I really love this whiskey, and i can't believe it was only $40.00.  Great value.  It say's on the label it was made with Passion and Purpose.  The way all whiskey should be in my opinion.  I don't think you can go wrong with this one.
Oak forward but hints of semi-sweet chocolate. High proof hits on the finish with pepper notes and cinnamon.
I know the approach here is unorthodox but this is undeniably good juice.   Sherry is strong, it’s hot but smooth, creamy mouthfeel.  Well done.
